about: I am a passionate Flutter developer with a knack for creating beautiful, high-performance mobile applications for both Android and iOS. With several years of experience in mobile development, I enjoy turning complex problems into simple, elegant solutions. When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies or contributing to open-source projects.

projects.title: Awesome Chat App
projects.description_short: A real-time chat application built with Flutter and Firebase.
projects.description_long: This is a full-featured chat application that includes real-time messaging, user authentication, push notifications, and media sharing. The backend is powered by Firebase's Firestore and Authentication services, ensuring scalability and reliability.

projects.title: E-Commerce Store
projects.description_short: A mobile storefront for a modern e-commerce platform.
projects.description_long: A complete mobile e-commerce solution with product browsing, a shopping cart, secure checkout with Stripe integration, and order history. The app is designed with a clean, user-friendly interface to provide an excellent shopping experience.

projects.title: Fitness Tracker
projects.description_short: An app to track workouts and monitor fitness goals.
projects.description_long: This app helps users track their fitness journey. Features include workout logging, progress charts, setting personal goals, and social sharing. It integrates with device sensors to track steps and distance.

experience.title: Senior Flutter Developer
experience.description: Led the development of several high-profile mobile apps, mentored junior developers, and established best practices for the mobile development team.

experience.title: Mobile App Developer
experience.description: Developed and maintained Android and iOS applications using Flutter, contributing to all phases of the development lifecycle, from concept to deployment.

education.description: Focused on software engineering, data structures, and algorithms. Completed a final year project on mobile application development.
